about_the_game:
Join us on Discord!

Dive into 'Intergalactic Pawn Shop,' a captivating, story-rich pawn shop simulation game!


Imagine being the key player in a bustling interstellar economy, where each customer brings a piece of the cosmos to your counter.

'Intergalactic Pawn Shop' melds the intricate management of a pawn shop—encompassing repairs, auctions, and the creation of compelling displays—with the significant decisions and ethical dilemmas of operating such an establishment in a futuristic setting. Will you emerge as a beacon of prosperity in the galaxy, or will your choices propel you into a web of intrigue and shadowy transactions?

Envision yourself negotiating with an alien over a mysterious artifact, then meticulously repairing a damaged starship component. 'Intergalactic Pawn Shop' fuses the day-to-day mechanics of pawn shop operations with the expansive narrative arcs of a sci-fi saga.



This game invites players to step into the role of a pawn shop clerk in a science fiction universe, blending detailed simulation with a branching narrative that culminates in multiple endings.

Features


- Immerse yourself in a detailed pawn shop simulation, overseeing repairs, auctions, and the display area to attract a diverse clientele.
- Embark on a non-linear adventure with choices that dictate your path, leading to unique endings and determining not only the destiny of your shop but the wider universe as well.

A powerful trading network is at your disposal, positioning you as a magnet for those in search of your services. The question remains: How will you wield this influence?

name: Intergalactic Pawn Shop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: 64bit CPU, 1 Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Intergalactic Pawn Shop is a single-player, story rich, pawn shop simulation game. In your hands lies a powerful trading network, making you a magnet for those seeking your services. Will you use this influence wisely? Remember, the outcomes of your decisions will rest solely on your shoulders.
